tagline: A seamless and modern solution for rental management.

tagline: Revolutionize educational management with cutting-edge functionality.

aboutProject.purpose: To streamline the management of educational centers with a modern, secure, and efficient platform.
aboutProject.problemSolved: Addresses inefficiencies in managing users, professors, clients, classes, resources, fees, and financials.
keyBenefits: Dynamic dashboards for seamless navigation.
Robust CRUD operations for efficient data management.
Enhanced transparency and efficiency in educational management.

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Showcases app capabilities, offering seamless navigation, dynamic dashboards, and efficient CRUD operations.

features.name: Admin Console - Clients
features.description: Manage client information with CRUD functionality for registration details, contact info, and personalized notes.

features.name: Admin Console - Classes
features.description: Manage class types, educational levels, professor assignments, and timetables efficiently.

features.name: Admin Console - Fees Management
features.description: Handle fee registration, including amount, date, client, and class, ensuring accurate records.

features.name: Admin Console - Attendance Tracking
features.description: Create presence sheets with automated student lists for accurate and clear attendance records.

features.name: Admin Console - Charges and Payments
features.description: Manage charges, payments, and automated resource population with real-time financial reporting.

callToAction.text: Transform your educational center today. Contact us!
